sentences.english: This acts as a breakwater and protects the islands from the sea.
sentences.chinese: 这也起到了防浪堤的作用并且保护岛屿不被海水侵蚀。

sentences.english: An island of the west-central Philippines south of Luzon. It was first visited by Spaniards in1570.
sentences.chinese: 民都洛岛菲律宾中西部一岛屿，位于吕宋岛以南。

sentences.english: Lewis. A Mars rampant with life. A water-covered Venus populated with floating, living islands.
sentences.chinese: 水覆盖下的金星移居来一些漂泊的栖身用的“岛屿”。

sentences.english: The islands lie at the southern end of the Kurile chain.
sentences.chinese: 这些岛屿位于千岛群岛的南端。

sentences.english: With so many island paradises to visit, it's no wonder the area is so popular.
sentences.chinese: 这区有许多岛屿渡假天堂可供游访，难怪如此热门。

sentences.english: You may bring up to two liters of alcohol and two cartons of cigarettes to the Caribbean islands.
sentences.chinese: 您可能会带来两个公升酒精和两箱香烟给加勒比岛屿。

sentences.english: Islander points to inhabitant of an island.
sentences.chinese: 岛民是指岛屿上的居民。

sentences.english: Most of these were acquired under the delightfully Guano Island Act. when the U.
sentences.chinese: 大多数岛屿都是由于“鸟粪岛法案”而获得的。

sentences.english: There are small islands that China has seized from Vietnam in during the Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 越战期间中国曾占领了越南一些小岛屿。

sentences.english: L30 He then sailed further south to an island which is now known as Newfoundland.
sentences.chinese: 他之后继续南行至现在叫芬兰的岛屿。

sentences.english: The coastal lines of Aegean Sea are long and winding where scatters with many gulf and dotted with numerous and island.
sentences.chinese: 爱琴海的海岸线非常曲折，港湾众多，岛屿星罗棋布。

sentences.english: On the left there is a city-island called Swiyazhsk.
sentences.chinese: 在左边有一个叫做斯维亚日斯克的城市岛屿。

sentences.english: The water surrounding these islands is often referred to as the Danish Archipelago.
sentences.chinese: 这些岛屿附近的水域通常被认为属于丹麦群岛的范围。

sentences.english: The bonds between 2011's islands of youth dissent remain limited.
sentences.chinese: 2011年持异议的青年人岛屿之间的联系仍然有限。

sentences.english: Seaplane mainly responsible for the airport to distant island transportation service.
sentences.chinese: 水上飞机主要负责机场到较远岛屿的接送。

definition: dry land (as opposed to the sea)
